1: <pb/>Laj Job kixsume laj Elifás chi jo'ka'in:
2: <pb/><t>Wi ta tinruhanq xb'isb'al sa' peex</t> <t>chixjunil linrahilal ut li ch'a'ajkilal,</t>
3: <t>numtajenaqaq raj raalal</t> <t>chiru li samahib' li wank chire li palaw!</t> <t>A'an xyaalal naq xin'aatinak chi jo'kan.</t>
4: <t>Xinxtiq' li Qaawa',<f>[11]</f> ut k'ajo' yo inxiw.</t> <t>Naweek'a sa' lintib'el li xmay chixjunileb' li xsimaj.<f>[12]</f></t>
5: <t>Ma naxchaj re li b'uur naq wank sa' li raxpim,</t> <t>ma namu'b'ak li b'ooyx naq wank sa' li pach'aya'?</t>
6: <t>Ma wank k'aru natzekamank chi maak'a' ratz'amil?</t> <t>Ma natawmank xsahil li xsaqal li mol?</t>
7: <t>Ut anaqwan nink'ul a'in:</t> <t>li k'aru maajun sut xwaj xtzekankil,</t> <t>a'an chik lintzekemq.</t>
8: <pb/><t>Us raj naq li Yos tixsume lintij</t> <t>ut tixk'e we li k'aru nintz'aama.</t>
9: <t>Us raj tinsachq chi junwaakaj</t> <t>ut chirisi taxaq linyu'am.</t>
10: <t>Maajun sut xinq'et li xchaq'rab' li Qaawa':</t> <t>a'an li xk'ojob'ankil linch'ool</t> <t>sa' li nimla rahilal wankin wi'.</t>
11: <t>Maak'a' chik inmetz'ew re xkuyb'al,</t> <t>k'a' chik ru nawoyb'eni re naq yo'yooqin?</t>
12: <t>Linmetz'ew laa'in maawa' li xkawilal li pek,</t> <t>chi moko li xkawil li q'anch'iich'.</t>
14: <t>Wi laa'ex ink'a' nikineetenq'a,</t> <t>naraj naxye naq ink'a' chik nekeroxloq'i li Nimajwal Yos.</t>
15: <t>Ab'an laa'ex, ex was wiitz'in,</t> <t>xineeb'alaq'i jo' junaq roq nima':</t> <t>wank nachaqik ut wank nab'ut'irk.</t>
16: <t>Naq naxha'res rib' li ratz'amke,</t> <t>tz'ajn ru li nima' ut q'axal kaw naxik;</t>
17: <t>ab'an chiru li saq'ehil nachaqik</t> <t>ut sa' tiqwal kutan maak'a' chik roqha'.</t>
18: <t>Laa'ex chanchanex laj yakonel aj Temá ut aj Sabá.</t> <t>Neke'xchap xb'eheb'</t>
19: <t>ut naq neke'ok sa' li chaqich'och',</t> <t>neke'xjal xb'eheb';</t> <t>sa' xch'ooleb' naq te'xtaw li nima'.</t>
20: <t>Ab'an naq ink'a' neke'xtaw,</t> <t>neke'kanaak chi sachsookeb' xch'ool,</t> <t>chi maak'a' chik royb'enihomeb',</t> <t>ut neke'kamk.</t>
21: <t>A'an ajwi' xeb'aanu we laa'ex:</t> <t>xeril li jwal xiwajel wankin wi', ut xchalk leexiw.</t>
22: <t>Ma xinye tab'i': K'ehomaq b'ayaq k'aru we,</t> <t>k'ehomaq intumin,</t>
23: <t>isihomaqin sa' ruq'eb' li xik' neke'ilok we,</t> <t>kolomaqin chiruheb' li ink'a' useb' xna'leb'?</t>
24: <pb/><t>Tzolomaqin, ut maak'a' tinye;</t> <t>yehomaq we k'aru xinluktaak wi'.</t>
25: <t>Wi ta xeye li yaal chiwix, moko ra ta raj xweek'a sa' inch'ool;</t> <t>ab'anan laa'ex xineejit chi maak'a' xyaalal.</t>
26: <t>Nekewech' rix li waatin.</t> <t>Ab'an xin'aatinak chi jo'kan,</t> <t>xb'aan naq maak'a' chik woyb'enihom;</t> <t>ut li waatin nak'ame'k xb'aan li iq'.</t>
27: <t>Laa'ex ink'a' nekexxutaanak</t> <t>chi xk'ayinkil junaq neb'a'yox malaj junaq eeramiiw.</t>
28: <t>Ut anaqwan ilomaqin</t> <t>ut yehomaq we wi xintik'ti'ik.</t>
29: <t>B'aanuhomaq usilal,</t> <t>tiikaq ru leech'ool</t> <t>ut mexraqok aatin chiwix.</t> <t>Yehomaq naq maak'a' inmaak.</t>
30: <t>Ink'a' xintik'ti'ik.</t> <t>Ma nekek'oxla naq ink'a' nink'e reetal</t> <t>b'ar wank li yaal ut li tik'ti'ik?</t>
